settings.promise_desc:
Fire Pit Surplus works with world-class brands like Elementi, Drolet Wood Stoves, Sunpak, and more. Our goal is to provide homeowners and industry professionals with the best heating products in the market. We are passionate about serving our customers and ensuring they feel supported in every step of the buying process. 

Whether you’re shopping for a propane fire pit, natural gas fire pit, infrared heater, or wood stove; you can shop with confidence that you’re getting the best deal and world-class customer service at Fire Pit Surplus.
